I am so afraid that this journey is going to come between the two of us, we been married for almost 30 years. I never ever thought this big C would get this hard . I am a strong person but it really is taking its toll on me

Posts.Content: Hi there your girlfriend sounds thou she as great support . When I was diagnosed in April first was right breast I knew that I had this a year, but after MRI I got it in both and to confuse matters all two different cancers in right and a different cancer in left, under gone three operations and know started chemo. Then a bilateral mastectomy with reconstruction . It one hell of a journey but positivity I think is the answer and it's not just us that's the patient it's our love ones who I think have to be the most strongest to keep us smiling you sound a very supporting person and it's hard, I feel like shouting hard at my husband sometimes but he takes it , bless him. Posts.Title: Partner has just been diagnosed with Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: I due to under go bilateral mastectomy with reconstruction all in one operation. Just started chemo so I think this operation will take place hopefully November. it is a big discussion weeble but I really want to keep my own body , so I have been offered reconstruction using my stomach fat which I have looked into and this gives a more natural look. Plus if I put weight on or lose weight so do the boobs. It is a very long operation 12 hours I was told but I absolute hate being put to sleep so me personally would go for a option where I am only put to sleep once. I spoke to a lady last night who's mum had the same op and said it had amazing results    it's very hard to make these choices but saying that the whole journey is hard love Diane x
